talk0001_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_01>Link.<sp:5:1:0> Once again, <sp:5:0:0>you have done Zora's
Domain a great service.

Thanks to the efforts of you and our
young King Sidon, the domain has been
saved.<sp:5:1:0> You must allow me to thank you.
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>With a Zora spear, three diamonds,
and five pieces of flint,<sp:5:0:0> I can craft
you the <clr:0000>Lightscale Trident<clr:ffff>.
Return when you have what is needed.
talk0001:
<snd:Angry_00>Link.<sp:5:1:0> If you intend to go up against the
various phenomena plaguing this world,
you need a weapon that is up to the task.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>The <clr:0000>Lightscale Trident<clr:ffff> has been passed
down through generations of the Zora
since ancient times. <sp:5:1:0>It will not fail you.
Bring me the necessary materials and I
will craft one for you with all due haste.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>You must acquire a Zora spear, three
diamonds, and five pieces of flint.

Even a <clr:0000>Zora spear<clr:ffff> that is decayed
will suffice.
talk0002_01:
<snd:TalkPositive_00>Will you be able to gather the required
materials for the <clr:0000>Lightscale Trident<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:1:0>
Here is what you must procure...
talk0013:
One <clr:0000>Zora spear<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0> Even a decayed one
will suffice.
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>I do not have any hesitation helping the
hero who saved the domain.

<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:ffff>I require a Zora spear, three diamonds,<sp:5:0:0>
and five pieces of flint.<sp:5:0:0> With those, I can
craft you the <clr:0000>Lightscale Trident<clr:ffff>.
talk0004_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_01>You acquired the necessary materials.
However...<sp:0:4:0>That <clr:0000>Zora spear<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0>has been altered in
some way.

I cannot craft the <clr:0000>Lightscale Trident<clr:ffff> using
an impure Zora spear.
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad_00>Return to me when you have the required
materials.<sp:5:0:0> I will be waiting.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>You have acquired all of the materials! 


This will not take long...
talk0004_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>If it were decayed, that would be no
matter. <sp:5:0:0>However, I require a Zora spear
that has not been altered in any way.
You can remove the addition yourself,
of course. However, <sp:5:0:0>know that it would
not survive the process.
<snd:TalkPositive_01>I hear there is someone in <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>,
up in <clr:0000>Akkala<clr:ffff> to the north, who can remove
items used to alter weapons.
You should perhaps pay them a visit...and
have them remove the item haphazardly
attached to your spear.
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad_00>If it becomes broken or lost, or if it has
otherwise disappeared from this world,<sp:5:0:0>
I will remake it for you.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>The Lightscale Trident...<sp:5:0:0> I am entrusting
it to you.
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Hm. I sense that the Lightscale Trident
has not been lost to this world.

If that changes, return and I will remake it
for you.
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Do you have the required materials?<sp:5:0:0>
If so, I will get to work.
